$PQEFF This money is really gonna help to buy the dip in this shit market

$PQEFF just the amount of people in contact with Kingsdale - literally every retail PQE shareholder - tells me this thing goes through. Imagine if it fell apart how many pissed off calls and emails they would have to deal with? How many threats of lawsuits and even if they had no merit their names would be dragged through the mud as scammers. Their phone lines would be jammed for all their clients for weeks.

They are putting out this personal touch trying to recruit people because this thing is definitely going through and they are trying to get 100% right now not 50%. I got my third call from them today. THIRD. I finally gave in and told them I‚Äôm tendering now so they leave me alone lol.

$PQEFF I have a feeling it‚Äôs going to be one of those situations like when you bet big on an NFL game and are anxious to hell about it. Then your team is up 31-0 at half time and you‚Äôre thinking to yourself ‚Äúdamn that was easy and not dramatic at all
created_at: I should have put more money in‚Äù. Viston will probably have 75% of the shares and the tender goes off without a hitch by February 7 and all of us will be looking at each other almost confused like ‚Äúwell
